There are many steps you can take to ensure the safety and security of your home:

1. Install a home security system: A comprehensive home security system may include motion detectors, alarm systems, window and door sensors, as well as video surveillance cameras.

2. Lock all doors and windows: Keep all entry points locked when away or asleep.

3. Utilize deadbolts for exterior doors: These provide an additional layer of protection against forced entry.

4. Secure sliding doors and windows with safety bars or other devices to prevent break-ins from happening easily.

5. Illuminate the premises through adequate outdoor lighting with motion-activated features around entrances, walkways, and parking areas during nighttime hours for better visibility.

6. Maintain good visibility around your property by keeping shrubs trimmed at low levels so burglars cannot use them as hiding spaces while approaching your house undetectedly under cover of bushes/trees fronting it along street approach sides etc..
